results.description: Combine competitor aggregated returns with short-term momentum. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using rel_ret_comp and ts_returns; SUGGESTION2 not applied (no clear vector field). SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage 0.8228). SUGGESTION4 applied (high user/alphaCount). Kept KEEP_IN_MIND: single datafield + operators <=7. Confidence 0.78 based on strong coverage and usage.

Momentum of competitors normalized by company cap. SUGGESTION1 used two fields (rel_ret_comp, pv13_revere_index_cap). SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 applied (pv13_revere_index_cap has high userCount). Kept operators small. Confidence 0.75.
Short-term mean reversion: negative zscore of recent competitor returns. SUGGESTION1 uses rel_ret_comp only for clarity. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.70.

Use customer return sign to filter alpha. SUGGESTION1 uses pv13_custretsig_retsig and rel_ret_all; SUGGESTION3 not applied (pv13_custretsig coverage >0.9). SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND: two datafields. Confidence 0.65.

Rank companies by competitors' PageRank: high competitor PageRank implies competitive pressure. SUGGESTION1 used pv13_com_page_rank and rel_ret_comp. SUGGESTION3 not needed (high coverage). SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.62.

Exploit divergence between competitors' HITS hub and authority scores. SUGGESTION1 uses pv13_com_rk_au and pv13_ompetitorgraphrank_hub_rank. Both high coverage so SUGGESTION3 skipped. SUGGESTION4 observed. Confidence 0.60.

Momentum of index value neutralized by country. SUGGESTION1 uses pv13_revere_index_value and pv13_revere_country (as group). SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used. KEEP_IN_MIND: group used only as group parameter. Confidence 0.76.

High number of single-sector pure-plays indicates sector concentration risk; combine with key sector counts. SUGGESTION1 uses single_sector_pureplay_company_count and pv13_revere_key_sector_total. Coverage for pureplay low so SUGGESTION3 applied with ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4 not applicable for pureplay. Confidence 0.55.
Long instruments whose competitors underperform relative partners. Uses rel_ret_comp and rel_ret_part. Both decent coverage; no backfill. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.68.
Many competitors dilute momentum; use competitor count to scale returns. SUGGESTION1 uses rel_num_comp and rel_ret_comp. SUGGESTION3 skipped. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

Companies with few customers but high customer returns are favorable. SUGGESTION1 uses rel_num_cust (low coverage) and rel_ret_cust (low coverage). Applied SUGGESTION3 to both via ts_backfill(30). SUGGESTION4 partly applied. Confidence 0.52.
Use partners' averaged returns as leading indicator. SUGGESTION1 uses rel_ret_part and ts_returns. Coverage moderate. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.63.

High correlation with competitors implies contagion risk; reduce exposure. SUGGESTION1 uses ts_corr between instrument returns (pv13_revere_index_value) and rel_ret_comp. SUGGESTION3 skipped. SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence 0.71.
Use competitor PageRank multiplied by customer return momentum. SUGGESTION1 uses pv13_com_page_rank and rel_ret_cust (low coverage -> backfill). SUGGESTION3 applied to rel_ret_cust. Confidence 0.58.
High competitor PageRank scaled by firm cap implies real pressure. SUGGESTION1 uses pv13_com_page_rank and pv13_revere_index_cap. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.64.
If competitors' authority score spikes while their returns fall, contrarian opportunity. Uses pv13_com_rk_au and rel_ret_comp. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.
Rising hub scores among customers predict breakout; use pv13_ustomergraphrank_hub_rank and ts_returns of pv13_revere_index_value. SUGGESTION1 applied, coverage ok. Confidence 0.59.
Average signal from all related returns (customers, partners, competitors). SUGGESTION1 uses rel_ret_all only (already aggregated). SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.72.
Prefer instruments whose competitors have low return volatility. SUGGESTION1 uses ts_std_dev on rel_ret_comp via ts_std_dev(rel_ret_comp,60). SUGGESTION2 not applied. Confidence 0.67.
Momentum in company market cap (index cap). SUGGESTION1 uses ts_returns(pv13_revere_index_cap,10) and ts_zscore. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.74.
PageRank zscore minus sector mean PageRank (using group_mean by country as proxy). SUGGESTION1 uses pv13_com_page_rank and pv13_revere_country. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.61.
Acceleration = recent returns minus returns a week ago for competitors. SUGGESTION1 uses ts_delta on rel_ret_comp. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.65.
Customers' PageRank rise may lead to upstream benefits. Uses pv13_ustomergraphrank_page_rank and ts_returns of instrument. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.
Fewer competitors with rising returns is favorable. Uses rel_num_comp and rel_ret_comp. SUGGESTION1 applied; no backfill. Confidence 0.69.
Partners outperform customers -> potential partner-driven growth. Uses rel_ret_part and rel_ret_cust (backfilled). SUGGESTION3 applied to rel_ret_cust. Confidence 0.53.

High number of terminal sectors suggests focused business; combine with pureplay count. Uses pv13_revere_term_sector_total and single_sector_pureplay_company_count (backfilled). SUGGESTION3 applied to pureplay. Confidence 0.50.
Use zipcode grouping to neutralize local effects then apply momentum. Uses pv13_revere_zipcode as group and pv13_revere_index_value. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.
Compare instrument index value vs parent sector level for mean reversion. Uses pv13_revere_parent as group key and pv13_revere_index_value. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.58.
High index return with low competitor PageRank is bullish. Uses pv13_revere_index_value and pv13_com_page_rank. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.66.
Competitors with high authority but low hub may indicate structural advantage; uses pv13_com_rk_au and pv13_ompetitorgraphrank_hub_rank. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54.
Weight competitor returns by number of overlapping product companies. Uses rel_ret_all and rel_num_all. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.68.
Detect recent flips in customer return sign (pv13_custretsig_retsig) using ts_arg_max of changes. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.56.
High kurtosis in index value returns suggests tail risk. Uses ts_kurtosis on pv13_revere_index_value. SUGGESTION1 single field for simplicity. Confidence 0.62.
Combine customers' authority rank with their returns to signal quality. Uses pv13_ustomergraphrank_auth_rank and rel_ret_cust (backfill). Applied SUGGESTION3 to rel_ret_cust. Confidence 0.55.
Low number of competitors but rising competitors' PageRank may signal consolidation breakout. Uses rel_num_comp and pv13_com_page_rank. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.
Momentum scaled by partner count: more partners dilute signal. Uses rel_ret_part and rel_num_part. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Recent max drawdown signal using ts_max_diff
results.description: Instrument return minus recent max to detect recovery potential. Uses pv13_revere_index_value ts_max_diff. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.70.
Use ts_ir on rel_ret_comp to prefer stable outperformers. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.73.

results.idea: Short-term mean reversion in index returns
results.description: Use negative short-term zscore of index returns. SUGGESTION1 single field for clarity. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Combine competitor count and customer sign for signaling
results.description: If customers positive but many competitors negative, signal. Uses pv13_custretsig_retsig and rel_num_comp. SUGGESTION1 used both; SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.61.
Zscore of competitors' PageRank within time series to catch rising centrality. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.63.
Normalize competitor returns within country group to remove country effects. Uses rel_ret_comp and pv13_revere_country. SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.69.
Rank instrument returns within parent sector (group_rank). Uses pv13_revere_parent as group and pv13_revere_index_value. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.
Use rel_num_all to filter overly crowded product overlap. SUGGESTION1 uses rel_num_all and rel_ret_all. Confidence 0.67.

Higher level sectors (pv13_revere_level) breakout vs lower levels. Uses pv13_revere_level and pv13_revere_index_value. pv13_revere_level coverage 0.62 (borderline) so no backfill applied but noted. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Index cap to competitor hub ratio
results.description: Large cap with low competitor hub score suggests stability. Uses pv13_revere_index_cap and pv13_ompetitorgraphrank_hub_rank. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Customer PageRank minus competitor PageRank signals unique customer quality. Uses pv13_ustomergraphrank_page_rank and pv13_com_page_rank. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.

Rising total companies in sector vs primary-focused count signals competition increase. Uses pv13_revere_company_total and primary_sector_focused_company_count (backfilled). SUGGESTION3 applied to low-coverage field. Confidence 0.49.
Use competitors' return stddev divided by competitor count to find resilient leaders. Uses ts_std_dev(rel_ret_comp,60) and rel_num_comp. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.66.
If instrument decorrelates from competitors rapidly, it's idiosyncratic â€” exploit. Uses ts_corr with short window. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.63.
Weight competitor returns by their PageRank to emphasize central competitors. Uses pv13_com_page_rank and rel_ret_comp. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.
Count NaNs in customer returns (data quality) and favor stable coverage. rel_ret_cust coverage <0.6 so applied ts_count_nans and ts_backfill. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.48.
Bucket zscore of index returns to discrete signals. Uses ts_zscore and bucket. SUGGESTION1 single field for simplicity. Confidence 0.59.
Compare pageRank trend (ts_delta) with competitor returns for divergence. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.
Normalize instrument return by parent-group stddev. Uses pv13_revere_parent and pv13_revere_index_value. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.65.
Average zscores of hub and authority for customers to form composite. Uses pv13_ustomergraphrank_auth_rank and pv13_ustomergraphrank_hub_rank. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.
Relative competitor density: competitors divided by total companies in sector. Uses rel_num_comp and pv13_revere_company_total. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.61.
If competitors hit recent max returns (arg max near 0), avoid. Uses ts_arg_max on rel_ret_comp. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Customer PageRank divided by customer count
results.description: High PageRank but few customers could indicate concentrated valuable customers. Uses pv13_ustomergraphrank_page_rank and rel_num_cust (backfilled). SUGGESTION3 applied to rel_num_cust. Confidence 0.50.

Average zscore of rel_ret_all, rel_ret_comp, rel_ret_part as a diversified relationship momentum. SUGGESTION1 uses multiple fields but within 2-datafield limit? To respect KEEP_IN_MIND2, use rel_ret_all and rel_ret_comp (proxy). SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.70.
Backfill low-coverage primary sector counts to increase signal stability. Uses primary_sector_focused_company_count with ts_backfill. SUGGESTION3 applied. SUGGESTION4 not applicable. Confidence 0.45.
Partners' authority rank times their return momentum. Uses pv13_ustomergraphrank_auth_rank and rel_ret_part. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.
Terminal sectors (pv13_revere_term) may have different dynamics; favor terminal if returns positive. pv13_revere_term coverage 0.4115 -> backfill applied. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.48.
Use mapping data as filter: when mapping missing, avoid. Uses pv13_reveremap (high coverage) and index returns. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.52.
Index momentum penalized by competitor momentum. Uses pv13_revere_index_value and rel_ret_comp. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.67.
Spread between customer hub and authority ranks may indicate network structural shifts. Uses pv13_ustomergraphrank_hub_rank and pv13_ustomergraphrank_auth_rank. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54.
Growing competitor count suggests rising pressure. Use ts_delta on rel_num_comp. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.
Penalize instruments with volatile competitor PageRank. Uses ts_std_dev(pv13_com_page_rank,60). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.61.
Spread between partners' and customers' returns as growth sign. rel_ret_part - rel_ret_cust (backfilled). SUGGESTION3 applied to rel_ret_cust. Confidence 0.54.
Neutralize competitor count by country group to detect outliers. Uses rel_num_comp and pv13_revere_country. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Index cap growth normalized by sector key counts
results.description: Cap momentum normalized by number of key sectors (pv13_revere_key_sector_total). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Competitor PageRank vs competitor returns correlation
results.description: If PageRank rises while returns fall (negative corr) it's an actionable divergence. Uses ts_corr(pv13_com_page_rank, rel_ret_comp,60). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.
Multiply competitor authority by their return zscore to emphasize stable high-authority movers. Uses pv13_com_rk_au and rel_ret_comp. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.61.
Growing customer counts indicate expanding demand; use ts_delta on rel_num_cust (backfilled). SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.51.
Combine partner returns with instrument cap to find scalable partner-driven growth. Uses rel_ret_part and pv13_revere_index_cap. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.
PageRank zscore minus average PageRank of competitors (proxied by rel_num_comp weight). Uses pv13_com_page_rank and rel_num_comp. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.
Use vec-like range via ts_max_diff to detect breakout from recent extremes. Uses pv13_revere_index_value. SUGGESTION2 not applied (no vector field). Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Customer PageRank zscore neutralized by country
results.description: Customer PageRank zscore neutralized across countries to find relative leaders. Uses pv13_ustomergraphrank_page_rank and pv13_revere_country. SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.60.
Penalize high changes in partner count via ts_std_dev of rel_num_part. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.
Multiply competitor return zscore with instrument return zscore to amplify agreement. Uses rel_ret_comp and pv13_revere_index_value. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.64.
Days from last sign change for customer returns indicates persistence. Uses days_from_last_change(pv13_custretsig_retsig). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.53.
PageRank divided by number of key sectors to identify standout centrality. Uses pv13_com_page_rank and pv13_revere_key_sector_total. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.
Winsorize competitor return zscore to reduce outliers. Uses winsorize(ts_zscore(ts_returns(rel_ret_comp,5),20)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Index returns ts_ir neutralized by country
results.description: Information ratio of index returns neutralized by country to find robust leaders. Uses ts_ir(pv13_revere_index_value,60) and pv13_revere_country. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Competitor PageRank change vs competitor returns
results.description: Detect when PageRank change diverges from competitor returns using ts_delta. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.
